00059 
00060 generic_server *generic_server::pinstance = 0;
00061 generic_server::generic_server(void)
00062 {
00063         pinstance = 0;
00064         command_port = 10000;
00065         plugins_path = "";
00066         max_threads = 100;
00067         timeout_seconds = 0;
00068         logname = "";
00069         server_cert = "";
00070         ca_certificate = "";
00071         verify_client = false;
00072         rsa_private_key = "";
00073         max_log_size = 10*1000*1000;
00074         max_logs_saved = 5;
00075         syslog_flag = false;
00076 #ifdef WINDOWS
00077         log_file_mutex = CreateMutex( NULL, FALSE, NULL);
00078         thread_cnt_mutex = CreateMutex( NULL, FALSE, NULL);
00079         thread_sync_mutex = CreateMutex( NULL, FALSE, NULL);
00080 #else
00081         pthread_mutex_init(&log_file_mutex,NULL);
00082         pthread_mutex_init(&thread_cnt_mutex,NULL);
00083         pthread_mutex_init(&thread_sync_mutex,NULL);
00084 #endif
00085 }

00087 
00088 generic_server *generic_server::instance(void)
00089 {
00090     return pinstance ? pinstance : (pinstance = new generic_server);
00091 }

00093 
00094 int  generic_server::log(unsigned int debug_level,unsigned int verbose_level,char *data) 
00095 {
00096 
00097         if(syslog_flag)
00098                 return(syslog_msg(debug_level,verbose_level,data));
00099         unsigned int msk = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00100         msk = msk << 4;
00101         get_log_file_mutex();
00102         debug_level = debug_level & ~msk; 
00103         if(verbose_level >= debug_level)
00104         {
00105                 if(log_file.is_open())
00106                         log_file << get_cur_time() << data << endl;
00107                 else
00108                         cout << get_cur_time() << data << endl;
00109         }       
00110         rel_log_file_mutex();
00111         return(1);
00112 }
00113 /*********************************************************************************************/
00114 
00115 int  generic_server::log(unsigned int debug_level,unsigned int verbose_level,string data) 
00116 {
00117         if(syslog_flag)
00118         return(syslog_msg(debug_level,verbose_level,data));
00119         unsigned int msk = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00120 
00121         msk = msk << 4;
00122         get_log_file_mutex();
00123         debug_level = debug_level & ~msk; 
00124         if(verbose_level >= debug_level)
00125         {
00126                 if(log_file.is_open())
00127                         log_file << get_cur_time() << data << endl;
00128                 else
00129                         cout << get_cur_time() <<  data << endl;
00130         }       
00131         rel_log_file_mutex();
00132         return(1);
00133 }
00134 /*********************************************************************************************/
00135 
00136 int  generic_server::get_log_file_mutex(void)
00137 {// not using pthread_cond variable, since Windows does not support cond. variables
00138 #ifdef WINDOWS
00139 DWORD dwWaitResult;
00140     dwWaitResult = WaitForSingleObject(log_file_mutex,INFINITE);
00141 #else
00142         pthread_mutex_lock(&log_file_mutex);
00143 #endif
00144     return(1);
00145 }
00146 /*********************************************************************************************/
00147 
00148 int generic_server::rollover_logs(void)
00149 {
00150         int i;
00151         unsigned long size;
00152         string file_name,fname2;
00153         struct _stat stFileInfo;
00154         size = get_log_size();
00155         map<int,string> log_files;
00156         map<int,string>::iterator itr;
00157         ostringstream oss;
00158         if(size > max_log_size)
00159         {       
00160                 log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,oss.str());
00161                 get_log_file_mutex();
00162                 if(log_file.is_open())
00163                         log_file.close();
00164             for(i = 0;i <= max_logs_saved; i++)
00165         {
00166                         stringstream oss;
00167             if(i > 0)
00168                                 oss << logname  << "." << i;
00169             else
00170                                 oss << logname;
00171             file_name = oss.str();
00172             if(!_stat(file_name.c_str(),&stFileInfo))
00173                 log_files[i] = file_name;
00174         }
00175                 if(log_files.size() == max_logs_saved+1)
00176                 {
00177                         itr = log_files.end();
00178                         itr--;
00179                         log_files.erase(itr);
00180                 }
00181                 if(log_files.size() == 1)
00182                 {
00183                         fname2 = logname + ".1";
00184                         rename(log_files[0].c_str(),fname2.c_str());
00185                 }
00186                 else
00187                 {       
00188                 for(i = log_files.size()-1; i >= 0;i--)
00189                         {
00190                                 stringstream oss;
00191                                 oss << logname  << "." << (i+1);
00192                 fname2 = oss.str();
00193                                 rename(log_files[i].c_str(),fname2.c_str());
00194                         }
00195                 }
00196                 log_file.open(logname.c_str());
00197                 rel_log_file_mutex();
00198         }
00199         return(1);
00200 }
00201 /*********************************************************************************************/

00203 int  generic_server::rel_log_file_mutex(void)
00204 {
00205 #ifdef WINDOWS
00206     ReleaseMutex(log_file_mutex);
00207 #else
00208         pthread_mutex_unlock(&log_file_mutex);
00209 #endif
00210     return(1);
00211 }

00263 int  generic_server::check_allocated_port(string in_plugin_id,string in_plugin_port)
00264 {
00265         vector <GENERIC_PLUGIN *>::iterator it;
00266 
00267         for(it = get_start_iterator(); it != get_end_iterator();it++)
00268         {
00269                 if((*it)->get_plugin_name() == in_plugin_id && (*it)->get_port() == atoi(in_plugin_port.c_str()))
00270                         return(1);
00271         }
00272         return(0);
00273 }
00274 /*********************************************************************************************/
00275  
00276 int  generic_server::check_enabled_plugin(string in_plugin_type)
00277 {
00278         int cnt;
00279         vector <GENERIC_PLUGIN *>::iterator it;
00280 
00281         for(cnt=0,it = get_start_iterator(); it != get_end_iterator();it++)
00282         {
00283                 if((*it)->get_plugin() == in_plugin_type)
00284                         cnt++;
00285         }
00286         return(cnt);
00287 }
00288 /*********************************************************************************************/
00289 
00290 bool generic_server::check_plugin_aliases(vector<string> &plugin_parms)
00291 {
00292         ostringstream oss;
00293     vector <GENERIC_PLUGIN *>::iterator it;
00294 
00295     for(it = get_start_iterator(); it != get_end_iterator();it++)
00296     {
00297         if( (*it)->get_plugin_name()    != plugin_parms.at(PLUGIN_NAME)       &&
00298             (*it)->get_plugin()      == plugin_parms.at(PLUGIN_TYPE)          &&
00299             (*it)->get_plugin_path() == plugin_parms.at(SHARED_LIB_PATH)      &&
00300                     (*it)->get_port()        == atoi(plugin_parms.at(PORT).c_str())   && 
00301                     (*it)->get_conf_file()   == plugin_parms.at(PLUGIN_CONF)          && 
00302                     (*it)->get_tls_flag()    == atoi(plugin_parms.at(TLS_FLAG).c_str()) 
00303                 )
00304                 {
00305                         if(!(*it)->find_plugin_alias(plugin_parms.at(PLUGIN_NAME)))
00306                                         (*it)->add_plugin_alias(plugin_parms.at(PLUGIN_NAME));
00307             return(true);
00308                 }
00309                 else
00310         if( (*it)->get_plugin_name()    != plugin_parms.at(PLUGIN_NAME)       &&
00311             (*it)->get_plugin()      == plugin_parms.at(PLUGIN_TYPE)          &&
00312                     (*it)->get_port()        == atoi(plugin_parms.at(PORT).c_str())   && 
00313                     (*it)->get_tls_flag()    == atoi(plugin_parms.at(TLS_FLAG).c_str()) 
00314                 )
00315                 {
00316                         if( (*it)->get_conf_file() != plugin_parms.at(PLUGIN_CONF) ||
00317                             (*it)->get_plugin_path() != plugin_parms.at(SHARED_LIB_PATH) )
00318                         { 
00319                                 oss << " Ignoring attempted plugin alias for: " << (*it)->get_plugin_name() << ". check alias configuration.";
00320                                 log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,oss.str());
00321                 return(true);
00322                         }
00323                 }
00324     }
00325     return(false);
00326 }
00327 /*********************************************************************************************/
00328 
00329 int generic_server::remove_devices(map <string,int> &new_ports)
00330 {
00331         vector <GENERIC_PLUGIN *>::iterator it;
00332         map <string,int>::iterator ports_itr;
00333         int pos;
00334         string new_pluginid;
00335 
00336         for(pos=0,it = get_start_iterator(); it != get_end_iterator();it++,pos++)
00337         {
00338                 ports_itr = new_ports.find((*it)->get_plugin_name());
00339                 if(new_ports.empty() || ports_itr == new_ports.end()) // a device / port got removed from conf_file
00340                 {
00341                         if((*it)->aliases_count())                               // Removed device in CONF has some alias devices
00342                         {                                                                                // We'll now make first alias device as the 'new'
00343                                 new_pluginid = (*it)->pop_alias();   // primary device
00344                                 (*it)->set_plugin_name(new_pluginid);
00345                         }
00346                         else                                                                     // Removed device in CONF does not have any alias devices
00347                         {                                                                                // remove it from global vector
00348                                 shutdown((*it)->get_socket(),2);
00349 #ifdef WINDOWS
00350                                 closesocket((*it)->get_socket());
00351 #else
00352                                 close((*it)->get_socket());
00353 #endif
00354                                 if( (check_enabled_plugin((*it)->get_plugin())) == 1)
00355                                         (*it)->server_shutdown();
00356                                 unload_shared_lib((*it)->get_plugin());
00357                                 v.erase(get_start_iterator()+pos);  
00358                                 pos = 0;
00359                                 it = get_start_iterator();
00360                                 continue;
00361                         }
00362                 }
00363         }
00364         return(1);
00365 }
00366 /*********************************************************************************************/
00367 
00368 int  generic_server::remove_all_aliases()
00369 {
00370     vector <GENERIC_PLUGIN *>::iterator it;
00371 
00372     for(it = get_start_iterator(); it != get_end_iterator();it++)
00373                 (*it)->clear_aliases();
00374     return(1);
00375 }

00377 
00378 int generic_server::get_server_params(string line,int start_type)
00379 {
00380         ostringstream os;
00381 
00382         if(line.size() > 9 && line.compare(0,9,"LOG_FILE=") == 0)
00383     {
00384         logname = line.substr(9);
00385                 if(logname.compare(0,6,"SYSLOG") != 0)
00386 #ifdef LINUX
00387                 {
00388                         syslog_flag = false;
00389                 log_file.open(logname.c_str(),ios_base::app);
00390                 }
00391                 else
00392                 {
00393                         syslog_flag = true;
00394                         openlog(process_name.c_str(),LOG_NDELAY,LOG_LOCAL0);
00395                 }
00396 #else
00397                 {
00398                         syslog_flag = false;
00399                         log_file.open(logname.c_str(),ios_base::app);
00400                 }
00401                 else
00402                 {
00403                         syslog_flag = true;
00404                         el.Init(trim(process_name).c_str());
00405                 }
00406 #endif
00407                 if(start_type == INIT)
00408                 {
00409                         os  << " Starting GENERIC_SERVER as: " << trim(process_name) << " with conf file: " << trim(conf_file);
00410                 log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
00411                 }
00412         return(0);
00413     }
00414         if(line.size() >  13 && line.compare(0,13,"COMMAND_PORT=") == 0)
00415     {
00416         command_port = atoi(line.substr(13).c_str());
00417         return(0);
00418     }
00419         if(line.size() > 19 && line.compare(0,19,"MAX_LOG_SIZE_IN_MB=") == 0)
00420     {
00421                 max_log_size = atoi(line.substr(19).c_str());
00422                 max_log_size = max_log_size*1000*1000;
00423         return(0);
00424     }
00425         if(line.size() > 15 && line.compare(0,15,"MAX_LOGS_SAVED=") == 0)
00426     {
00427                 max_logs_saved = atoi(line.substr(15).c_str());
00428         return(0);
00429     }
00430     if (line.size() > 16 && line.compare(0,16,"TIMEOUT_SECONDS=") == 0)
00431     {
00432                 timeout_seconds = atoi(line.substr(16).c_str());
00433         return(0);
00434     }
00435     if (line.size() >  12 && line.compare(0,12,"MAX_THREADS=") == 0)
00436     {
00437                 max_threads = atoi(line.substr(12).c_str());
00438         return(0);
00439     }
00440     if (line.size() > 19 && line.compare(0,19,"SERVER_CERTIFICATE=") == 0)
00441     {
00442                 server_cert = line.substr(19);
00443         return(0);
00444     }
00445     if (line.size() >  16 && line.compare(0,16,"RSA_PRIVATE_KEY=") == 0)
00446     {
00447                 rsa_private_key = line.substr(16);
00448         return(0);
00449     }
00450     if (line.size() >  15 && line.compare(0,15,"CA_CERTIFICATE=") == 0)
00451     {
00452                 ca_certificate = line.substr(15);
00453         return(0);
00454     }
00455     if (line.size() > 14 && line.compare(0,14,"VERIFY_CLIENT=") == 0)
00456     {
00457                 if(atoi(line.substr(14).c_str()))
00458                         verify_client = true;
00459                 else
00460                         verify_client = false;
00461         return(0);
00462     }
00463     if (line.size() >  13 && line.compare(0,13,"PLUGINS_PATH=") == 0)
00464     {
00465                 plugins_path = line.substr(13);
00466         return(0);
00467     }
00468         return(1);
00469 }
00470 /*********************************************************************************************/
00471 
00472 int  generic_server::init() 
00473 {
00474         int ret;
00475         GENERIC_PLUGIN *plugin;
00476         vector<string> plugin_parms;
00477         string line,delim,library_image;
00478         ostringstream os;
00479         
00480         ret = 0;
00481 #ifdef WINDOWS
00482         if (!sock_init())
00483         {
00484                 cout << "Can't init socket library! " << endl;
00485         return(0);
00486         }
00487         TCHAR filebuf[MAX_SZ];
00488         get_exe_directory(filebuf,MAX_SZ);
00489         SetCurrentDirectory(filebuf);
00490 #endif
00491         tls_setup_reqd = 0;
00492         delim = "|";
00493         ifstream inf(conf_file.c_str());
00494 
00495     if(!inf)
00496     {
00497         cout << " Can't Open file: " << conf_file << endl;
00498         return(0);
00499     }   
00500     while(getline(inf, line))
00501     {
00502                 line = trim(line);
00503         if(line.length() == 0 || line.at(0) == '#')
00504             continue;
00505                 if(!get_server_params(line,INIT))
00506                         continue;
00507                 plugin_parms = split(line,delim,true);
00508                 if(plugin_parms.size() != 7)
00509                         continue;
00510                 set_plugins_path(plugin_parms);
00511                 // returns true if PLUGIN_NAME is a new alias or an existing alias
00512                 // generic_plugin will be updated in case of new alias
00513                 if(check_plugin_aliases(plugin_parms))
00514                         continue;
00515                 plugin = load_shared_lib(plugin_parms.at(SHARED_LIB_PATH),plugin_parms.at(PLUGIN_TYPE));
00516                 if(plugin == NULL)
00517                 {
00518                         os  << " Thr.ID:MAIN load_library failed: " << plugin_parms.at(SHARED_LIB_PATH) << " PLUGIN_TYPE: " << plugin_parms.at(PLUGIN_TYPE) << endl;
00519                         log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
00520                 return 0;
00521                 }
00522                 plugin = initialize_plugin_object(plugin_parms,plugin);
00523                 if(plugin == NULL)
00524                 return(0);
00525                 v.push_back(plugin);
00526     }
00527         inf.close();
00528         if(!tls_initialize())
00529                 return(0);
00530 return(1);
00531 }
00532 /*****************************************************************************************/
00533 
00534 int generic_server::tls_initialize()
00535 {
00536         ostringstream os;
00537     if(rsa_private_key != "" && server_cert != ""  && ca_certificate !="")
00538     {
00539         if(!tls_setup())
00540         {
00541             os  << " Thr.ID:MAIN TLS_init failed.";
00542             log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
00543             return(0);
00544         }
00545     }
00546     else if(tls_setup_reqd)
00547     {
00548         os  << " Thr.ID:MAIN TLS not correctly setup in CONF file. Please check.";
00549         log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
00550         return(0);
00551     }
00552 return(1);
00553 }
00554 /*****************************************************************************************/
00555 
00556 int generic_server::tls_setup()
00557 {
00558         ostringstream os;
00559 
00560         sslserver.set_cert_file(server_cert);
00561         sslserver.set_priv_key(rsa_private_key);
00562         sslserver.set_ca_cert(ca_certificate);
00563         sslserver.set_verify_client(verify_client);
00564         if(!sslserver.tls_init())
00565         {
00566         os  << " Thr.ID:MAIN Unable to initiliaze TLS.";
00567                 log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,(char *)os.str().c_str());
00568                 return(0);
00569         }
00570         if(!sslserver.CreateCTX())
00571         {
00572         os  << " Thr.ID:MAIN Unable to set TLS context.";
00573                 log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,(char *)os.str().c_str());
00574                 return(0);
00575         }
00576         if(!sslserver.LoadCerts())
00577         {
00578         os  << " Thr.ID:MAIN Unable to load TLS certificates.";
00579                 log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,(char *)os.str().c_str());
00580                 return(0);
00581         }
00582     os  << " Thr.ID:MAIN successfully initialized TLS.";
00583         log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,(char *)os.str().c_str());
00584         return(1);
00585 }
00586 /*****************************************************************************************/
00587 
00588 int generic_server::unload_shared_lib(string plugin_type)
00589 {
00590 #ifdef WINDOWS
00591         FreeLibrary((HMODULE)dll_handles[plugin_type]);
00592 #else
00593         dlclose(dll_handles[plugin_type]);
00594 #endif
00595         return(1);
00596 }
00597 /*****************************************************************************************/
00598 
00599 GENERIC_PLUGIN *generic_server::load_shared_lib(string library_image,string plugin_type)
00600 {
00601         GENERIC_PLUGIN *plugin_p;
00602         ostringstream os;
00603 
00604 #ifndef WINDOWS
00605         void* handle = dlopen(library_image.c_str(),RTLD_LAZY);
00606         if(handle == NULL)
00607         {
00608         os  << " Thr.ID:MAIN Can't load DLL: " << " " <<  dlerror();
00609         log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
00610                 return(NULL);
00611         }
00612         factory[plugin_type] = (create_fp) dlsym(handle, "create_instance");
00613         dll_handles[plugin_type] =  (void *) handle;
00614 #else
00615         HMODULE handle;
00616         handle = LoadLibrary(library_image.c_str());
00617         if(handle == NULL)
00618         {
00619                 os.str("");
00620         os.clear();
00621         os  << " Thr.ID:MAIN Error loading: " << library_image << " " << GetLastError();
00622         log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
00623                 return(NULL);
00624         }
00625         factory[plugin_type] = (create_fp) GetProcAddress(handle, "create_instance");
00626         dll_handles[plugin_type] = (void *) handle;
00627 #endif
00628         if(factory[plugin_type] == NULL)
00629         {
00630         os  << " Thr.ID:MAIN Can't instantiate PLUGIN_TYPE: " << plugin_type;
00631         log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
00632                 return(NULL);
00633         }
00634         plugin_p = (factory[plugin_type])();
00635     os  << " Thr.ID:MAIN loaded plugin version: " << plugin_p->get_plugin_version() << " for PLUGIN_TYPE: " << plugin_type;
00636     log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
00637         return(plugin_p);
00638 }
00639 /*****************************************************************************************/
00640 
00641 #ifdef WINDOWS
00642 int  generic_server::sock_init(void)
00643 {
00644         WSADATA wsaData;
00645         int iResult;
00646         // Initialize Winsock
00647         iResult = WSAStartup(MAKEWORD(2,2), &wsaData);
00648         if (iResult != 0)
00649                 return(0);
00650         return(1);
00651 }
00652 #endif
00653 /*****************************************************************************************/
00654 
00655 int generic_server::socket_close(SOCKET sock)
00656 {
00657 int iResult;
00658     // shutdown the connection since we're done
00659     iResult = shutdown(sock, 2);
00660 #ifdef WINDOWS
00661         closesocket(sock);
00662 #else
00663         close(sock);
00664 #endif
00665     if (iResult == SOCKET_ERROR) 
00666         {
00667 #ifdef WINDOWS
00668         //WSACleanup();
00669 #endif
00670         return 0;
00671     }
00672     return 1;
00673 }
00674 /*****************************************************************************************/
00675 
00676 int generic_server::plugin_read_conf_file(GENERIC_PLUGIN *plugin,int thread_no)
00677 {
00678     ostringstream os; 
00679     string line,delim,conf_file;
00680     conf_file = plugin->plugin_conf_file;
00681 
00682     delim = "|";
00683     ifstream inf(conf_file.c_str());
00684     if(!inf.rdbuf()->is_open())
00685     {   
00686         os  << " Thr.ID:" << thread_no << " Plugin:" << plugin->get_plugin_name() << " 11 cannot read: " << conf_file;
00687         log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
00688         return(0);
00689     }
00690     while(getline(inf, line))
00691     {
00692         line = trim(line);
00693         if(line.length() == 0 || line.at(0) == '#')
00694             continue;
00695         if(!plugin->get_plugin_params(line))
00696             continue;
00697     }   
00698     inf.close();
00699 return(1);
00700 }   
00701 /*****************************************************************************************/
00702 
00703 string generic_server::trim(const std::string& s)
00704 {
00705   if(s.length() == 0)
00706     return s;
00707   size_t b = s.find_first_not_of(" \t\r\n");
00708   size_t e = s.find_last_not_of(" \t\r\n");
00709   if(b == -1) // No non-spaces
00710     return "";
00711   return string(s, b, e - b + 1);
00712 }
00713 /*****************************************************************************************/
00714 
00715 string generic_server::get_cur_time(void)
00716 {
00717 time_t tim;
00718 struct tm now;
00719 ostringstream os;
00720 
00721     tim=time(NULL);
00722 #ifdef LINUX
00723     localtime_r(&tim,&now);
00724 #else
00725     localtime_s(&now,&tim);
00726 #endif
00727     os << setw(2) << setfill('0') << now.tm_mon+1 << "/" ;
00728     os << setw(2) << setfill('0') << now.tm_mday  << "/";
00729     os << setw(2) << setfill('0') << now.tm_year+1900 << " ";
00730     os << setw(2) << setfill('0') << now.tm_hour << ":";
00731     os << setw(2) << setfill('0') << now.tm_min  << ":";
00732     os << setw(2) << setfill('0') << now.tm_sec;
00733     return(os.str());
00734 }
00735 /*****************************************************************************************/
00736 
00737 int generic_server::get_thread_id()
00738 {
00739         THREAD_INFO th_info;
00740         int new_thread_id,thread_cnt;
00741 #ifdef WINDOWS
00742         DWORD dwWaitResult;
00743         dwWaitResult = WaitForSingleObject(thread_cnt_mutex,INFINITE);
00744 #else
00745         pthread_mutex_lock(&thread_cnt_mutex);
00746 #endif
00747         map<int,THREAD_INFO>::iterator it;
00748 
00749     for(thread_cnt = 0,it = thread_ids.begin(); it != thread_ids.end();it++,thread_cnt++)
00750         {
00751                 th_info = (THREAD_INFO) (*it).second;
00752         if(th_info.state == THREAD_FREE)
00753                 {
00754                         th_info =  (THREAD_INFO) (*it).second;
00755                         th_info.state = THREAD_ALLOCATED;
00756                         thread_ids[thread_cnt] = th_info;
00757                         new_thread_id = (*it).first;
00758                         break;
00759                 }
00760         }
00761         if(it == thread_ids.end())
00762         {
00763                 th_info.state = THREAD_ALLOCATED;
00764                 thread_ids[thread_cnt] = th_info;
00765                 new_thread_id = thread_cnt;
00766         }
00767 #ifdef WINDOWS
00768     ReleaseMutex(thread_cnt_mutex);
00769 #else
00770         pthread_mutex_unlock(&thread_cnt_mutex);
00771 #endif
00772     return(new_thread_id);
00773 }
00774 /*********************************************************************************************/
00775 
00776 int generic_server::rel_thread_id(int thread_id)
00777 {
00778     int status;
00779 #ifdef WINDOWS
00780     DWORD dwWaitResult;
00781     dwWaitResult = WaitForSingleObject(thread_cnt_mutex,INFINITE);
00782 #else
00783     pthread_mutex_lock(&thread_cnt_mutex);
00784 #endif
00785 
00786         if(thread_ids.find(thread_id) != thread_ids.end())
00787         {
00788                 thread_ids[thread_id].state = THREAD_COMPLETED;
00789                 status = 1;
00790         }
00791         else
00792                 status = 0;
00793 #ifdef WINDOWS
00794     ReleaseMutex(thread_cnt_mutex);
00795 #else
00796     pthread_mutex_unlock(&thread_cnt_mutex);
00797 #endif
00798     return(status);
00799 }
00800 /*********************************************************************************************/
00801 
00802 int generic_server::close_thread_ids(void)
00803 {
00804     THREAD_INFO th_info;
00805     int thread_cnt;
00806 #ifdef WINDOWS
00807     DWORD dwWaitResult;
00808     dwWaitResult = WaitForSingleObject(thread_cnt_mutex,INFINITE);
00809 #else
00810     pthread_mutex_lock(&thread_cnt_mutex);
00811 #endif
00812     map<int,THREAD_INFO>::iterator it;
00813 
00814     for(thread_cnt = 0,it = thread_ids.begin(); it != thread_ids.end();it++,thread_cnt++)
00815     {
00816         th_info = (THREAD_INFO) (*it).second;
00817         if(thread_ids[thread_cnt].state == THREAD_COMPLETED)
00818         {
00819 #ifdef WINDOWS
00820             CloseHandle(th_info.th);
00821 #endif
00822             thread_ids[thread_cnt].state = THREAD_FREE;
00823         }
00824     }
00825 #ifdef WINDOWS
00826     ReleaseMutex(thread_cnt_mutex);
00827 #else
00828     pthread_mutex_unlock(&thread_cnt_mutex);
00829 #endif
00830     return(1);
00831 }
00832 /*****************************************************************************************/
00833 
00834 vector <GENERIC_PLUGIN *>::iterator generic_server::get_start_iterator(void)
00835 {
00836     vector <GENERIC_PLUGIN *>::iterator it = v.begin();
00837     return(it);
00838 }
00839 /*********************************************************************************************/
00840 
00841 vector <GENERIC_PLUGIN *>::iterator generic_server::get_end_iterator(void)
00842 {
00843         vector <GENERIC_PLUGIN *>::iterator it = v.end();
00844         return(it);
00845 }
00846 /*********************************************************************************************/
00847 
00848 int generic_server::print_key_message()
00849 {
00850         vector <GENERIC_PLUGIN *>::iterator it;
00851         GENERIC_PLUGIN tmp_plugin;
00852         ostringstream os;
00853 
00854         log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,(char *)" Thr.ID:MAIN thread. Doing PLUGIN_WALK: ");
00855     for(it = get_start_iterator(); it != get_end_iterator();it++)
00856         {
00857                 os.str("");
00858                 os.clear();
00859                 os << *(*it);
00860         log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
00861         }
00862         os.str("");
00863         os.clear();
00864     os  << " RSA: " << rsa_private_key;
00865     os  << " CERT: " << server_cert;
00866     os  << " CA-CERT: " << ca_certificate;
00867         log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
00868         os.str("");
00869         os.clear();
00870     os  << " GENERIC_SERVER framework version: " << get_framework_version() << " using GEN_PLUGIN version: ";
00871         os  << tmp_plugin.generic_plugin_version() << " ready.";
00872     log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
00873 
00874         return(1);
00875 }
00876 /*********************************************************************************************/
00877 
00878 int generic_server::set_access_control(char daemon_flag)
00879 {
00880         ostringstream os;
00881 #ifdef LINUX
00882     if(getuid() != 0 && !daemon_flag)
00883     {
00884         os  << " Thr.ID:MAIN thread. Only 'root'' user can start generic_server.."; 
00885         log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
00886         cout  << " Thr.ID:MAIN thread. Only 'root' user can start generic_server.." << endl;
00887                 return(0);
00888     }
00889 #endif
00890         return(1);
00891 }
00892 /*********************************************************************************************/
00893 
00894 int generic_server::swap_bytes(unsigned char *key)
00895 {
00896         unsigned char buff[25];
00897         memcpy(buff,key,16);
00898         memcpy(key,buff+8,8);
00899         memcpy(key+8,buff,8);
00900 return(1);
00901 }
00902 /*********************************************************************************************/
00903 
00904 int generic_server::bb_getline(char *sav_buffer,size_t length,size_t conn_s)
00905 {
00906         fd_set socks;
00907         struct timeval timeout;
00908         char str[MAX_SZ];
00909         size_t readsock,t;
00910         size_t bytes_recvd;
00911 
00912     memset(sav_buffer,0,sizeof(sav_buffer));
00913     memset(str,0,MAX_SZ);
00914     bytes_recvd = 0;
00915 
00916     while(1)
00917     {
00918        FD_ZERO(&socks);
00919        FD_SET(conn_s,&socks);
00920        timeout.tv_sec = 0;
00921        timeout.tv_usec = 50000;    
00922        readsock = select((int)conn_s+1,&socks,NULL,NULL,&timeout);
00923        if(bytes_recvd && readsock <= 0)
00924              return(bytes_recvd);
00925        if(FD_ISSET(conn_s,&socks))
00926        {
00927            if ((t = recv(conn_s,str,sizeof(str), 0)) > 0)
00928            {
00929                                 memcpy(sav_buffer+bytes_recvd,str,t);
00930                 bytes_recvd += t;
00931                 if(bytes_recvd >= length)
00932                         return(bytes_recvd);
00933            }
00934            else
00935                    {
00936                return(bytes_recvd);
00937                    }
00938        }
00939     }
00940 }
00941 /*******************************************************************************************/
00942 
00943 int generic_server::bb_getline(char *sav_buffer,size_t length,size_t conn_s,int secs)
00944 {
00945     fd_set socks;
00946     struct timeval timeout;
00947     char str[MAX_SZ];
00948     size_t readsock,t;
00949         size_t bytes_recvd;
00950     bytes_recvd = 0;
00951 
00952     memset(sav_buffer,0,sizeof(sav_buffer));
00953     memset(str,0,MAX_SZ);
00954 
00955     while(1)
00956     {
00957        FD_ZERO(&socks);
00958        FD_SET(conn_s,&socks);
00959        timeout.tv_sec = secs;
00960        timeout.tv_usec = 0;
00961        readsock = select((int)conn_s+1,&socks,NULL,NULL,&timeout);
00962        if(readsock <= 0)   
00963              return(bytes_recvd);
00964        if(FD_ISSET(conn_s,&socks))
00965        {
00966            if ((t = recv(conn_s,str,sizeof(str), 0)) > 0)
00967            {
00968                 memcpy(sav_buffer,str,t);
00969                 bytes_recvd += t;
00970                 if(bytes_recvd >= length)
00971                         return(bytes_recvd);
00972            }
00973            else
00974              return(bytes_recvd);
00975        }
00976     }
00977 }
00978 /******************************************************************************************/
00979 
00980 int generic_server::get_status(unsigned char *buff)
00981 {
00982         return(((buff[0]-48)*10)+(buff[1]-48));
00983 }
00984 /******************************************************************************************/
00985 
00986 int generic_server::close_log(void)
00987 {
00988                 if(log_file.is_open())
00989                         log_file.close();
00990         return(1);
00991 }
00992 /******************************************************************************************/
00993 
00994 int generic_server::get_log_size()
00995 {
00996 #ifdef WINDOWS
00997         struct _stat fileStat; 
00998 #else
00999         struct stat fileStat;
01000 #endif
01001         int err;
01002         
01003 #ifdef WINDOWS
01004         err = _stat(logname.c_str(),&fileStat); 
01005 #else
01006         err = stat(logname.c_str(),&fileStat);
01007 #endif
01008         if (err != 0) 
01009                 return 0; 
01010         return fileStat.st_size; 
01011 }
01012 /*****************************************************************************************************/
01013 
01014 vector<string> generic_server::split(const string& s, const string& delim, const bool keep_empty = true) 
01015 {
01016     vector<string> result;
01017     if (delim.empty()) 
01018         {
01019         result.push_back(s);
01020         return result;
01021     }
01022     string::const_iterator substart = s.begin(), subend;
01023     while (true) 
01024         {
01025         subend = search(substart, s.end(), delim.begin(), delim.end());
01026         string temp(substart, subend);
01027         if (keep_empty || !temp.empty()) 
01028             result.push_back(temp);
01029         if (subend == s.end()) 
01030             break;
01031         substart = subend + delim.size();
01032     }
01033     return result;
01034 }
01035 /*****************************************************************************************************/
01036 #ifdef WINDOWS
01037 BOOL generic_server::get_exe_directory(TCHAR *obuf, size_t osize)  
01038  {  
01039      if(!GetModuleFileName(0, obuf, osize))  
01040      {  
01041          *obuf = '\0';// insure it's NUL terminated  
01042          return FALSE;  
01043      }      
01044      // run through looking for the *last* slash in this path.  
01045      // if we find it, NUL it out to truncate the following  
01046      // filename part.  
01047      TCHAR*lastslash = 0;  
01048      for(; *obuf; obuf++)  
01049      {  
01050          if (*obuf == '\\' || *obuf == '/')  
01051              lastslash = obuf;  
01052      }  
01053      if(lastslash) 
01054                 *lastslash = '\0';  
01055      return TRUE;  
01056 }  
01057 /*****************************************************************************************************/
01058 #endif
01059 
01060 int  generic_server::reload_conf_file(void) 
01061 {
01062         GENERIC_PLUGIN *plugin;
01063         vector <string> plugin_parms;
01064         map <string,int> new_conf_ports;
01065         string line,delim,library_image;
01066         ostringstream os;
01067         vector <GENERIC_PLUGIN *>::iterator it;
01068 
01069         log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,(char *)" Thr.ID:MAIN thread. SIGNAL received to re-read conf file..");
01070         delim = "|";
01071         ifstream inf(conf_file.c_str(),ifstream::in);
01072     if(!inf)
01073         return(0);
01074         close_log();
01075         remove_all_aliases();
01076     while(getline(inf, line))
01077     {
01078                 line = trim(line);
01079         if(line.length() == 0 || line.at(0) == '#')
01080             continue;
01081                 if(!get_server_params(line,RELOAD))
01082                         continue;
01083                 if(command_port == 0)
01084                 {
01085                         os << " Thr.ID:MAIN thread. COMMAND_PORT not defined in CONF file." << endl;
01086                         log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
01087                         command_port = 10000;
01088                         return(0);
01089                 }
01090                 plugin_parms = split(line,delim,true);
01091                 set_plugins_path(plugin_parms);
01092                 new_conf_ports[plugin_parms.at(PLUGIN_NAME)] = atoi(plugin_parms.at(PORT).c_str());
01093                 if(check_allocated_port(plugin_parms.at(PLUGIN_NAME),plugin_parms.at(PORT)))
01094                         continue;
01095         // returns true if PLUGIN_NAME is a new alias or an existing alias
01096         // generic_plugin will be updated in case of new alias
01097         if(check_plugin_aliases(plugin_parms))
01098             continue;
01099                 plugin = load_shared_lib(plugin_parms.at(SHARED_LIB_PATH),plugin_parms.at(PLUGIN_TYPE));
01100                 if(plugin == NULL)
01101                 {
01102                         os.str("");
01103                         os.clear();
01104                         os  << " Thr.ID:MAIN thread. load_library failed for: " << plugin_parms.at(SHARED_LIB_PATH) << endl;
01105                         log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
01106                 return 0;
01107                 }
01108                 plugin = initialize_plugin_object(plugin_parms,plugin);
01109                 if(plugin == NULL)
01110                         return(0);
01111                 v.push_back(plugin);
01112     }
01113         inf.close();
01114         remove_devices(new_conf_ports);
01115         print_key_message();
01116 return(1);
01117 }
01118 /*****************************************************************************************/
01119 
01120 int generic_server::set_plugins_path(vector<string> &plugin_parms)
01121 {
01122         if(plugins_path != "")
01123         {
01124                 plugin_parms.at(SHARED_LIB_PATH) = plugins_path + "//" + plugin_parms.at(SHARED_LIB_PATH);
01125                 if(plugin_parms.size() > PLUGIN_CONF)
01126                         plugin_parms.at(PLUGIN_CONF) = plugins_path + "//" + plugin_parms.at(PLUGIN_CONF);
01127         }
01128         return(1);
01129 }
01130 /*****************************************************************************************/
01131 
01132 string generic_server::get_plugins_path()
01133 {
01134         return(plugins_path);
01135 }
01136 /*****************************************************************************************/
01137 
01138 GENERIC_PLUGIN *generic_server::initialize_plugin_object(vector<string> plugin_parms,GENERIC_PLUGIN *plugin)
01139 {
01140         int ret;
01141         ostringstream os;
01142         SOCKET ListenSocket;
01143         string bootstrap_name;;
01144 
01145         plugin->set_port(atoi(plugin_parms.at(PORT).c_str()));
01146         plugin->set_plugin(plugin_parms.at(PLUGIN_TYPE));
01147         plugin->set_plugin_name(plugin_parms.at(PLUGIN_NAME));
01148         plugin->set_plugin_number(plugin_parms.at(PLUGIN_NUMBER));
01149         plugin->set_plugin_path(plugin_parms.at(SHARED_LIB_PATH));
01150         plugin->set_tls_flag(atoi(plugin_parms.at(TLS_FLAG).c_str()));
01151         memcpy(&plugin->pinstance,&pinstance,4);
01152         if( (ListenSocket = plugin->initialize_socket(plugin_parms.at(PORT))) == 0)
01153                 return(NULL);
01154         plugin->set_socket(ListenSocket);
01155         if(plugin->get_tls_flag())
01156                 tls_setup_reqd = 1;
01157         if(plugin_parms.size() > PLUGIN_CONF)
01158         {
01159                 plugin->set_conf_file(plugin_parms.at(PLUGIN_CONF));
01160                 ret = plugin_read_conf_file(plugin,0);
01161         if(!ret)         // read in plugin_specific config parameters
01162         {
01163             os  << " Thr.ID:MAIN plugin_init failed for: " << plugin->get_plugin_name() << endl;
01164             log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
01165             return(NULL);
01166                 }
01167         }
01168         bootstrap_name = plugin->bootstrap_name();
01169         map<string,bool>::iterator it = bootstrap_jobs.find(bootstrap_name);
01170         if(it == bootstrap_jobs.end() && bootstrap_name != "")
01171         {
01172                 os  << " Thr.ID:MAIN Invoking bootstrap: " << bootstrap_name << " on plug-in: " << plugin->get_plugin_name();
01173                 log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
01174                 os.str("");
01175                 os.clear();
01176                 if(!plugin->bootstrap_init(bootstrap_name))
01177                 {
01178                         os  << " Thr.ID:MAIN failed to bootstrap: " << bootstrap_name << " on plug-in: " << plugin->get_plugin_name();
01179             log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
01180             return(NULL);
01181                 }
01182                 bootstrap_jobs[bootstrap_name] = true;
01183                 os  << " Thr.ID:MAIN Successfully bootstrapped: " <<  bootstrap_name << " on plug-in: " << plugin->get_plugin_name();
01184                 log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
01185                 os.str("");
01186                 os.clear();
01187         }
01188         if(!check_enabled_plugin(plugin_parms.at(PLUGIN_TYPE)))
01189         {
01190                 if(!plugin->server_init()) // Will do only once per plugin type
01191                 {
01192                         os  << " Thr.ID:MAIN thread. server_init failed for: " << plugin_parms.at(PLUGIN_TYPE) << endl;
01193                         log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
01194                         return(NULL);
01195                 }
01196         }
01197         setnonblocking(ListenSocket);
01198         return(plugin);
01199 }
01200 /*****************************************************************************************/
01201 
01202 int generic_server::setnonblocking(SOCKET sock)
01203 {
01204         int iResult;
01205 #ifdef WINDOWS
01206         u_long iMode = 1;
01207         iResult = ioctlsocket(sock, FIONBIO, &iMode);
01208         if (iResult != NO_ERROR)
01209                 return(0);
01210         return(1);
01211 #else
01212         int     opts = fcntl(sock,F_GETFL);
01213         if (opts < 0) 
01214                 return(0);
01215         opts = (opts | O_NONBLOCK);
01216         if (fcntl(sock,F_SETFL,opts) < 0) 
01217                 return(0);
01218         return(1);
01219 #endif
01220 }
01221 /*****************************************************************************************/
01222 
01223 int generic_server::setblocking(SOCKET sock)
01224 {
01225     int iResult;
01226 #ifdef WINDOWS
01227     u_long iMode = 0;
01228     iResult = ioctlsocket(sock, FIONBIO, &iMode);
01229     if (iResult != NO_ERROR)
01230         return(0);
01231     return(1);
01232 #else
01233     int opts = fcntl(sock,F_GETFL);
01234     if (opts < 0)
01235         return(0);
01236     opts = (opts | ~O_NONBLOCK);
01237     if (fcntl(sock,F_SETFL,opts) < 0)
01238         return(0);
01239     return(1);
01240 #endif
01241 }
01242 /*****************************************************************************************/
01243 
01244 SOCKET generic_server::create_socket(int port)
01245 {
01246     SOCKET ListenSocket;
01247     struct addrinfo *result = NULL;
01248     struct sockaddr_in local_address;
01249     struct addrinfo hints;
01250     ostringstream os;
01251     int iResult;
01252 
01253         os << port;
01254     memset(&local_address,0,sizeof(local_address));
01255     memset(&hints, 0,sizeof(hints));
01256     hints.ai_family = AF_INET;
01257     hints.ai_socktype = SOCK_STREAM;
01258     hints.ai_protocol = IPPROTO_TCP;
01259     hints.ai_flags = AI_PASSIVE;
01260     iResult = getaddrinfo(NULL, os.str().c_str(), &hints, &result);
01261     if (iResult != 0)
01262     {
01263         os.str("");
01264         os.clear();
01265         os  << " Thr.ID:MAIN getaddrinfo failed.";
01266         log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
01267     }
01268     ListenSocket = socket(result->ai_family, result->ai_socktype, result->ai_protocol);
01269     if (ListenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET)
01270     {
01271         os.str("");
01272         os.clear();
01273         os  << " Thr.ID:MAIN socket creation failed.";
01274         log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
01275         freeaddrinfo(result);
01276         return 0;
01277     }
01278     local_address.sin_family = AF_INET;
01279     local_address.sin_addr.s_addr = inet_addr("127.0.0.1");
01280     local_address.sin_port = htons(port);
01281     iResult = bind(ListenSocket, (sockaddr *) &local_address, (int)result->ai_addrlen);
01282     if (iResult != 0)
01283     {
01284         os.str("");
01285         os.clear();
01286         os  << " Thr.ID:MAIN socket bind failed for port: " << port;
01287         log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
01288         freeaddrinfo(result);
01289         shutdown(ListenSocket,2);
01290 #ifdef WINDOWS
01291         closesocket(ListenSocket);
01292 #else
01293         close(ListenSocket);
01294 #endif
01295         return 0;
01296     }
01297     iResult = listen(ListenSocket, SOMAXCONN);
01298     if (iResult == SOCKET_ERROR)
01299     {
01300         os.str("");
01301         os.clear();
01302         os  << " Thr.ID:MAIN socket listen failed for port: " << port;
01303         log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
01304         shutdown(ListenSocket,2);
01305 #ifdef WINDOWS
01306         closesocket(ListenSocket);
01307 #else
01308         close(ListenSocket);
01309 #endif
01310         return 0;
01311     }
01312         setnonblocking(ListenSocket);
01313     return(ListenSocket);
01314 }
01315 /*********************************************************************************************/
01316 
01317 int generic_server::syslog_msg(unsigned int debug_level,unsigned int verbose_level,string data)
01318 {
01319     unsigned int msk = 0xFFFFFFFF;
01320     msk = msk << 4;
01321     debug_level = debug_level & ~msk;
01322     if (verbose_level >= debug_level)
01323     {
01324         switch(debug_level)
01325         {
01326 #ifdef LINUX
01327             case LOG_LOW:
01328                 syslog(LOG_INFO,"%s",trim(data).c_str());
01329                 break;
01330             case LOG_MEDIUM:
01331                 syslog(LOG_NOTICE,"%s",trim(data).c_str());
01332                 break;
01333             case LOG_HI:
01334                 syslog(LOG_WARNING,"%s",trim(data).c_str());
01335                 break;
01336 #else
01337             case LOG_LOW:
01338                 el.Write(EVENTLOG_INFORMATION_TYPE, trim(data).c_str());
01339                 break;
01340             case LOG_MEDIUM:
01341                 el.Write(EVENTLOG_INFORMATION_TYPE, trim(data).c_str());
01342                 break;
01343             case LOG_HI:
01344                 el.Write(EVENTLOG_WARNING_TYPE, trim(data).c_str());
01345                 break;
01346 #endif
01347         }
01348     }
01349 
01350     return(1);
01351 }
01352 /*********************************************************************************************/
01353 
01354 int generic_server::ssl_async_write(SSL *ssl,char *buf,int size)
01355 {
01356         signed int status,status1,ssl_response;
01357         ostringstream oss;
01358         ssl_response = 1;
01359         while(ssl_response == 1)
01360         {
01361                 oss.str("");
01362                 oss.clear();
01363                 status = SSL_write((SSL *)ssl,buf,size);
01364                 if(status > 0)
01365                         break;
01366                 status1 = SSL_get_error((SSL *)ssl,status);
01367                 switch(status1)
01368                 {
01369                         case SSL_ERROR_WANT_READ:
01370                                 oss << " AWRITE: ERROR: SSL_ERROR_WANT_READ ";
01371                                 break;
01372 
01373                         case SSL_ERROR_WANT_WRITE:
01374                                 oss << " AWRITE: ERROR: SSL_ERROR_WANT_WRITE ";
01375                                 break;
01376 
01377                         case SSL_ERROR_WANT_CONNECT:
01378                                 oss << " AWRITE: ERROR: SSL_ERROR_WANT_CONNECT ";
01379                                 break;
01380 
01381                         case SSL_ERROR_WANT_ACCEPT:
01382                                 oss << " AWRITE: ERROR: SSL_ERROR_WANT_ACCEPT ";
01383                                 break;
01384 
01385                         case SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL:
01386                                 oss << " AWRITE: ERROR: SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL ";
01387                                 ssl_response = -1;
01388                                 break;
01389 
01390                         case SSL_ERROR_NONE:
01391                                 oss << " AWRITE: ERROR: SSL_ERROR_NONE ";
01392                                 ssl_response = 0;
01393                                 break;
01394 
01395                         case SSL_ERROR_SSL:
01396                                 oss << " AWRITE: ERROR: SSL_ERROR_SSL ";
01397                                 ssl_response = -1;
01398                                 break;
01399 
01400                         case SSL_ERROR_ZERO_RETURN:
01401                                 oss << " AWRITE ERROR: SSL_ERROR_ZERO_RETURN ";
01402                                 ssl_response = 0;
01403                                 break;
01404                 }
01405         }
01406         if(ssl_response < 0)
01407         {
01408                 //log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,oss.str());
01409                 return(ssl_response);
01410         }
01411         if(ssl_response == 0)
01412         {
01413                 //log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,oss.str());
01414                 return(0);
01415         }
01416         return(1);
01417 }
01418 /*********************************************************************************************/

01420 int generic_server::ssl_async_read(SSL *ssl,char *buf,int size)
01421 {
01422         signed int status,status1,ssl_response;
01423         ostringstream oss;
01424         ssl_response = 1;
01425         while(ssl_response == 1)
01426         {
01427                 oss.str("");
01428                 oss.clear();
01429                 status = SSL_read((SSL *)ssl,buf,size);
01430                 if(status > 0)
01431                         break;
01432                 status1 = SSL_get_error((SSL *)ssl,status);
01433                 switch(status1)
01434                 {
01435                         case SSL_ERROR_WANT_READ:
01436                                 oss << " AREAD: ERROR: SSL_ERROR_WANT_READ ";
01437                                 break;
01438 
01439                         case SSL_ERROR_WANT_WRITE:
01440                                 oss << " AREAD: ERROR: SSL_ERROR_WANT_WRITE ";
01441                                 break;
01442 
01443                         case SSL_ERROR_WANT_CONNECT:
01444                                 oss << " AREAD: ERROR: SSL_ERROR_WANT_CONNECT ";
01445                                 break;
01446 
01447                         case SSL_ERROR_WANT_ACCEPT:
01448                                 oss << " AREAD: ERROR: SSL_ERROR_WANT_ACCEPT ";
01449                                 break;
01450 
01451                         case SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL:
01452                                 oss << " AREAD: ERROR: SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL ";
01453                                 ssl_response = -1;
01454                                 break;
01455 
01456                         case SSL_ERROR_NONE:
01457                                 oss << " AREAD: ERROR: SSL_ERROR_NONE ";
01458                                 ssl_response = 0;
01459                                 break;
01460 
01461                         case SSL_ERROR_SSL:
01462                                 oss << " AREAD: ERROR: SSL_ERROR_SSL ";
01463                                 ssl_response = -1;
01464                                 break;
01465 
01466                         case SSL_ERROR_ZERO_RETURN:
01467                                 oss << " AREAD: ERROR: SSL_ERROR_ZERO_RETURN ";
01468                                 ssl_response = 0;
01469                                 break;
01470                 }
01471         }
01472         if(ssl_response < 0)
01473         {
01474                 //log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,oss.str());
01475                 return(ssl_response);
01476         }
01477         if(ssl_response == 0)
01478         {
01479                 //log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,oss.str());
01480                 return(0);
01481         }
01482         return(status);
01483 }

01485 
01486 int generic_server::ssl_async_accept(SSL *ssl)
01487 {
01488         signed int status,status1,ssl_response;
01489         ostringstream oss;
01490         ssl_response = 1;
01491         while(ssl_response == 1)
01492         {
01493                 oss.str("");
01494                 oss.clear();
01495                 status = SSL_accept((SSL *)ssl);
01496                 if(status > 0)
01497                         break;
01498                 status1 = SSL_get_error((SSL *)ssl,status);
01499                 switch(status1)
01500                 {
01501                         case SSL_ERROR_WANT_READ:
01502                                 oss << " ACCEPT: ERROR: SSL_ERROR_WANT_READ ";
01503                                 break;
01504 
01505                         case SSL_ERROR_WANT_WRITE:
01506                                 oss << " ACCEPT: ERROR: SSL_ERROR_WANT_WRITE ";
01507                                 break;
01508 
01509                         case SSL_ERROR_WANT_X509_LOOKUP:
01510                                 oss << " ACCEPT: ERROR: SSL_ERROR_WANT_CONNECT ";
01511                                 break;
01512 
01513                         case SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL:
01514                                 oss << " ACCEPT: ERROR: SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL ";
01515                                 ssl_response = -1;
01516                                 break;
01517 
01518                         case SSL_ERROR_NONE:
01519                                 oss << " ACCEPT: ERROR: SSL_ERROR_NONE ";
01520                                 ssl_response = 0;
01521                                 break;
01522 
01523                         case SSL_ERROR_SSL:
01524                                 oss << " ACCEPT: ERROR: SSL_ERROR_SSL ";
01525                                 ssl_response = -1;
01526                                 break;
01527 
01528                         case SSL_ERROR_ZERO_RETURN:
01529                                 oss << " ACCEPT: ERROR: SSL_ERROR_ZERO_RETURN ";
01530                                 ssl_response = 0;
01531                                 break;
01532                 }
01533         }
01534         if(ssl_response <= 0)
01535         {
01536                 log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,oss.str());
01537                 return(0);
01538         }
01539         return(status);
01540 }
